query.name: posts_get_by_topic_id
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.email, u.title, u.url, u.location, u.use_avatar, u.signature, u.email_setting, u.num_posts, u.registered, u.admin_note, p.id, p.poster AS username, p.poster_id, p.poster_ip, p.poster_email, p.message, p.hide_smilies, p.posted, p.edited, p.edited_by, g.g_id, g.g_user_title, o.user_id AS is_online FROM &prefix;posts AS p INNER JOIN &prefix;users AS u ON u.id=p.poster_id INNER JOIN &prefix;groups AS g ON g.g_id=u.group_id LEFT JOIN &prefix;online AS o ON (o.user_id=u.id AND o.user_id!=1 AND o.idle=0) WHERE p.topic_id=? ORDER BY p.id LIMIT ?,?
